subject: Fix build error.
commitMessage:
Fix build error.

I cannot understand why the previous patch doesn't work with WAYLAND build configuration.
Why the "bcond_with" and "if %{with wayland}" doesn't work?

It gets always fails to find the x11 package even I use the bcond_with option.
the build system always tries to find the x11 package.

Change-Id: Iba9d470a375f9b76dfdd506c83eda30d05aaf066
